tool_description: Get a catalogue of newly added anime and episodes along with  working streaming links .
name: Anime Streaming
title: Anime Streaming

api_list.name: latest-anime
api_list.description: Gets all new anime added in last 24 hours
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-streaming.p.rapidapi.com/latest-anime"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-streaming.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-streaming.p.rapidapi.com/latest-anime"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-streaming.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
